raw_body: WICKRAMASINGHE – MONICA (MONA). Daughter of late Oswald and Agnes Pereira, beloved wife of late Patrick Wickramasinghe, much loved mother of Pamela and late Aloma, mother-in-law of late Mervyn Bernard, beloved grandmother of Keith and Deepani, Sandra and Tamara. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Parlour, Borella on April 9th from 9.00 a.m. to 3.30 p.m.
